scenes.description: Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, and Houshou Marine perform the song 'adrenaline!!!' on the beach.
MC section on the beach where the trio discusses the performance, the heat, and takes gravure-style photos.
Flare hears a mysterious voice calling her and runs off to investigate.
Scene transition to a forest at night, where Tsunomaki Watame is waiting for Flare.
